tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Newsnight) (, ,)) (VP (VBG showing) (NP (DT the) (NN government)) (NP (NP (DT some) (JJ interesting) (NNS data)) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT the) (NN summer) (NNS riots))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [showing/VBG nsubj>[Newsnight/NNP punct>,/,] iobj>[government/NN det>the/DT] dobj>[data/NNS det>some/DT amod>interesting/JJ nmod:on>[riots/NNS case>on/IN det>the/DT compound>summer/NN]] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Government)) (VP (VBZ maintains) (PRT (RP off)) (NP (DT the) (NN cuff) (NN response))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [maintains/VBZ nsubj>Government/NNP compound:prt>off/RP dobj>[response/NN det>the/DT compound>cuff/NN] punct>./.]
